img_above_text:
![Wukong YellowFlower 23.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/8/87/Wukong_YellowFlower_23.jpg)
He can also adopt a ready stance and expel projectiles all around him. They'll fly about like angry gnats and threaten to deal several hits, but these are the kind of projectiles you can easily deflect with your staff spin.
img_below_text:
Aside from this, he doesn't have too much else to worry about. As long as you can get rid of his students quickly, and react quickly whenever he swings the bigger sword, you can anticipate and retaliate against most of his moves. When he falls, he'll drop a Knot of Voidness, and you can claim his Commander Beetle Spirit.
Commander Beetle

He can also adopt a ready stance and expel projectiles all around him. They'll fly about like angry gnats and threaten to deal several hits, but these are the kind of projectiles you can easily deflect with your staff spin."
        - Following Text: "Aside from this, he doesn't have too much else to worry about. When he falls, he'll drop a Knot of Voidness, and you can claim his Commander Beetle Spirit.
Commander Beetle"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a boss fight against "Commander Beetle" in *Black Myth: Wukong*. The boss, a large armored beetle-like creature, is shown mid-attack, emitting red energy and wielding a large weapon. The player's health and ability icons are visible, indicating an active combat scenario. The context suggests the player must manage the boss's projectile attacks and eliminate its minions to succeed. Defeating Commander Beetle rewards the player with a Knot of Voidness and the Commander Beetle Spirit.
